pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inference for Spatiotemporal Partially Observed Markov Processes // Inference on panel data using spatiotemporal partially- observed Markov process (SpatPOMP) models. The 'spatPomp' package extends 'pomp' to include algorithms taking advantage of the spatial structure in order to assist with handling high dimensional processes. See Asfaw et al. (2023) arXiv:2101.01157 for further description of the package.
